WorkItem.ClosedComment: After lengthy debate (all over 24 hours) user indicated problem solved.
WorkItem.Description: It would be nice if there was a toggle, that would allow you to switch from relative to absolute rating of items.  Right now it shows absolute rating for all items (e.g. "This item will contribute 500 DPS to your overall DPS."), but all that I often care about is how much an item will improve me (e.g. "This item will contribute 25 DPS more than the current item worn in that slot.").  At that point, it would be nice if all items that contribute less score than the lowest scoring item selected as available (i.e. the item you're wearing) disappeared from the list, while in "relative mode".  This would make for much more meaningful, and compact, upgrade lists.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Optimizer.UL] Add ability to show relative and absolute rating in Upgrade List
